news.title: Tesla reports 336,000 vehicle deliveries in first quarter, 13% drop from a year ago
news.summary: Tesla reported a 13% year-over-year drop in first-quarter deliveries. The news comes two days after the company's stock wrapped up its worst quarter since 2022.

news.title: Private companies added 155,000 jobs in March, more than expected, ADP says
news.summary: Payroll gains were stronger than expected in March, countering fears that the labor market and economy were slowing. Payroll gains in March were strong than expected, countering concerns that the economy was slowing.

news.title: UFC signs wide-ranging sponsorship deal with Meta, bringing Mark Zuckerberg closer to Dana White
news.summary: Meta and mixed martial arts league UFC reach a multimillion-dollar, multiple-year sponsorship deal. The deal will span the tech company's portfolio, UFC said.

news.title: United Airlines adds Thailand, Vietnam and Australia flights in latest expansion
news.summary: United Airlines is adding service to Vietnam and Thailand in October. Nonstop service from San Francisco to Adelaide, Australia, will begin in December.

news.title: Tequila maker says tariffs won't affect his prices. Here's why he plans to absorb costs
news.summary: Colorado-based Suerte Tequila said it will absorb all tariff costs. The company is owned by billionaire James Packer, who has a stake in the company.
